bug.short_desc: New lint JSDoc hints for explicit inclusion don't work

long_desc.thetext:
Neither @use nor @require has any effect on resulting set of classes. These new lint hints are already documented (http://manual.qooxdoo.org/current/pages/development/api_jsdoc_ref.html#use) so current state is misleading.
Qooxdoo master branch is using only old-style #use and #require. Since old style hints are going to be deprecated anyway, it could make sense to move to JSDoc hints exclusively (including #asset and #clrd which currently have no JSDoc representation, which is potentially a candidate for another bug).

Fixed.
NB: It's not unusual that different parts of the framework show different stages of completeness regarding a specific feature - after all, it's the development version. Often it's the other way round, though, features are implemented without being documented. One way or the other, you have temporary inconsistencies.
It's pretty clear that there shouldn't be expectation of completeness in a development version. However I hope you don't arguing me out of reporting these inconsistencies ;-)
Closed all bugs already shipped with a release.
